A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I love Star Wars\, and normally I love most things Disney.  But\, together these things equate to a shit sandwich.

I wanted to fall in love all over again with this saga as I did after watching The Force Awakens.  I didn't .  I left the theater underwhelmed.  

But\, the more I thought about this movie\, the more I've grown to actually hate it.  I won't get into the dozens of reasons why\, as other reviewers here have done a terrific job pointing out the many flaws in the movie.  I'll just say that it's been 2 weeks since I've seen it and I'm still fuming.  It's a slow burn that ignites every time I think of the potential wasted.
